String liquibase.database.SybaseDatabase.getProductName (  ) 

Returns the full database product name.

May be different than what the JDBC connection reports (getDatabaseProductName())

String liquibase.database.SybaseDatabase.getTypeName (  ) 

Returns an all-lower-case short name of the product.

Used for end-user selecting of database type such as the DBMS precondition.

String liquibase.database.SybaseDatabase.getDefaultDriver ( String  url  ) 

If this database understands the given url, return the default driver class name.

Otherwise return null.

boolean liquibase.database.SybaseDatabase.isCorrectDatabaseImplementation ( Connection  conn  )  throws JDBCException

Drops all objects owned by the connected user.

The Sybase functionality overrides this and does not remove the Foreign Keys.

Unfortunately it appears to be a problem with the Drivers, see the JTDS driver page. http://sourceforge.net/tracker/index.php?func=detail&aid=1471425&group_id=33291&atid=407762

Reimplemented from liquibase.database.MSSQLDatabase.
